response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $8,000. Considering its value to you, we're offering it for $10,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the significant benefits and advantages this product will bring to you. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and contribute greatly to your success. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
